instructions.reason_for_call:
You have a couple requests.
For order #W5056519, you want to change the address to be the same as order #W8277957. For order #W5056519, you want to  exchange Makeup Kit {'skin tone': 'light', 'kit size': 'professional', 'brand': 'Brand B'} to {'skin tone': 'dark', 'brand': 'Brand A'}. Finally, you want to cancel order #W5995614 because you ordered by mistake.
instructions.known_info: Your name is Yara Muller and your email is yara.muller9246@example.com.

messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

Hi. I'm having a really rough day and everything seems to be going wrong with my orders. I have a few things I need help with, if that's even possible. 

First, I need to change the shipping address on order #W5056519. It needs to be the same address that was used for my other order, #W8277957. I'm worried it's already too late, though.

To get started, I'll need to authenticate your account. Could you please provide the email address associated with your profile? Alternatively, your first and last name along with your zip code would also work.

Once I've verified your identity, I can look into the status of order #W5056519 and see if we can still update the shipping address to match the one on order #W8277957.
